title: EXT_textureInfo_constant_lod TextureInfo Extension
description: Enables dynamically calculated UV coordinates to keep the texture near a constant level of detail

repetitions.description: The number of times the texture is repeated per meter.

offset.description: The offset in meters used to shift the texture.

minClampDistance.description: The minimum distance in meters from the eye to the surface at which to clamp the texture.

maxClampDistance.description: The maximum distance in meters from the eye to the surface at which to clamp the texture.
